about_the_game:
About this Music Pack


The following two works from 16dimensional records have been re-edited and looped.
This is a collection of chiptune-style BGM, perfect for retro games.




Creator: Don

Track List


Alyssum
Babys Breath
Bamboo Blossom
Birdman
Gerbera
Lovers in metal
Narcissus
Robiopsys
Salvia
Sayonara Satellites
Tachibana
Whitescape
detailed_description:
Terms of Use

  • This BGM can be used freely, regardless of whether the game in question is free or not.
  • This pack itself may also be freely copied and redistributed.
    However, the sale of individual materials in this pack is strictly forbidden.
  • The creator does not require credit.
  • These materials can be freely edited and modified.
  • The creator shall bear no responsibility whatsoever for any problems that may arise in accordance with the use of these materials.

name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Go & Gone Square Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 15 MB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System supporting Pixel Game Maker MV
